#### Description
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Health Services is seeking the services of a registered psychologist to conduct psychological risk assessments for offenders at the Beaver Creek Complex in the Ontario Region. The contractor will work with the interdisciplinary health services team to identify and assess psychological needs of offenders and provide recommendations for effective interventions.  Please find attached the tender documents for registration, national essential health services framework, and business case information.
